name: That's Why Billiards Are Played in A Plane
name_original: That's Why Billiards Are Played in A Plane
description:
I tried getting billiards out of a plane and putting it in a 3D space. It turned out to be pretty hard to hit any holes in 3D. So now the balls are in space and they don't lose velocity after collisions.

Each turn lasts 5s after the player hits the white ball.

Controls:

- WASD:  Move the camera.

- Right mouse button: Rotate the camera.

- Left mouse button: Hit the white ball.

Check out this cool song: https://opengameart.org/content/enchanted-tiki-86

Hole SFX: https://opengameart.org/content/space-ship-shield-sounds
